Network.en_message:
This puzzle shows the issues with "Line of Sight."  Wireless signals need to have a clear path to follow.  Trees and a number of things will block the signal.  You can go through some obstacles, but it is best to have a clear line of sight.

To see the problem, try to ping google and the server from pc1.  Then, move the wireless access-points to the window, where there is a clear line of sight beween the buildings.
